name: Baldi's - Field Trip: Camping
description:
***For a comfortable game, we recommend that you increase the brightness level to the maximum.***

Earlier, Baldi was at school and taught mathematics, now you have a trip to the Camping!
No Education in School, now Field Trip: Camping!

Go to Camping with Baldi for fun!

You are tired of studying and especially solve math problems from Baldi in notebooks!
You came from Baldi to the forest to rest and fry the marshmallow. But the fire can go out. In order not anger Baldi, you need to collect the branches and throw them into the fire.
Collect as many branches as possible to get a lot of bonuses!
Be careful, Baldy is angry, otherwise he will overtake You and punish with a ruler!

Forget the basics of Baldi in the field of education and training, in our game you have to run in the forest through the forest and collect branches, so as not to anger Baldi. How long can you live, a day, two or five nights in a scary forest, where there's no one else besides you and Baldi?

In this field trip, you go camping with Baldi. Your goal is to keep the fire alive for three minutes. You can play it safe by throwing small amounts of firewood onto the fire, or you can take a riskier strategy by trying to gather a lot of pieces of firewood and throw them in all at once. Extra fuel gets converted into big points!

You will have a limited amount of time, because you will be chased by Baldi, if the fire goes out, then it will be dark, scary and evil Baldy will catch up with you!

Features:
- Learn the basics of Baldi and go through all his tests.
- You are waiting for amazing adventures in the camp, after which education and education is not needed.
- You will experience a real horror with Baldi.
- Live longer than five nights.
- Earn as many points as possible.

You need to collect the branches in the camp so that the fire does not go out. For every time the fire goes out, an angry baldi can arrange a horror for you and if he finds you, then there will be no turning back. To survive more than five nights, you need to know all the basics of Baldi in the camp.
